Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The park is only 15 minutes from Boston, with free parking and shuttle service to and from the Quincy Center MBTA Station, and features panoramic views of downtown Boston, Quincy Bay and the Blue Hills.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Batterymarch Park is a four-building, 50-acre first class office park located at the strategic intersection of the Southeast Expressway, Routes 3 and 128 in Quincy, Massachusetts. The park is owned and managed by the National Fire Protection Association, which is headquartered at 1 Batterymarch Park.
